annotation: The short reference here is to a more complete story that Jens had told during an earlier session (BJK 2.01).
danish_manuscript: Kro. Niels fra Gravlev og boede i Tveden h. skulde ride til Nibe med en Hest hans F. havde solgt og have 5 Rdl. for den.
english_manuscript: Kro. Niels from Gravlev who lived in Tveden was supposed to ride to Nibe with a horse his father had sold and was to get 5 rixdollars for it.
english_publication: Unpublished version reads: Kro. Niels from Gravlev who lived in Tveden was supposed to ride to Nibe with a horse his father had sold and was to get five rixdollars for it.
